getLongestMovies: SELECT tconst,primaryTitle,runtimeMinutes,genres FROM movies ORDER BY runtimeMinutes DESC LIMIT 10
getTopRatedMovies: SELECT m.tconst,m.primaryTitle,m.genres,r.averageRating  FROM movies m, reviews r WHERE m.tconst=r.tconst AND r.averageRating > 6.0
getMoviesGenre: WITH genre AS ( SELECT m.genres as GENRE , m.primaryTitle, sum(r.numVotes) AS numVotes FROM movies m, reviews r Where m.tconst=r.tconst GROUP BY m.genres,m.primaryTitle WITH ROLLUP ) SELECT coalesce(GENRE,"Total"),coalesce(primaryTitle,"Total"),numVotes FROM genre
updateRuntimeMinutes: UPDATE movies SET runtimeMinutes CASE WHEN GENRE = 'Documentary' THEN runtimeMinutes + 15 WHEN GENRE = 'Animation' THEN runtimeMinutes + 30 ELSE runtimeMinutes + 45
